name: mediatum-view
description: Web app as a client for the GraphQL API of mediaTUM

scripts.generate: rimraf gen && elm-graphql http://localhost:5000/graphql --base Mediatum --output gen/
scripts.compile: rimraf elm-stuff && ncp src/assets dist && elm make --output=dist/app.js src/elm/Main.elm
scripts.build: npm run generate && npm run compile
scripts.start: ncp src/assets dist && elm-live -u -e node_modules/.bin/elm -d dist src/elm/Main.elm -x /graphql -y http://localhost:5000 -- --output=dist/app.js --debug

author: Thomas Weiser
